Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log

Wraps and frameworks the Android menu feature.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Logger
    Just in order to have various loggers.
    Loggerable
    An interface which enables to log.
    LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator
    The interface that should be implemented through the SmartConfigurator class (with no package name, because of Android restriction), in order to indicate to the framework which Logger implementation should be used.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidLogger
    The logger implementation for Android.
    Log4JLogger
    The logger implementation for Log4J, which works with the "android-logging-log4j" library.
    LoggerFactory
    In order to have an entry point for the logging interface.
    LoggerWrapper
    A class which enables to wrap a Logger, and to delegate all its interface methods to its underlying logger.
    NativeLogger
    An implementation which uses the Java standard output and error streams.

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log Description

Wraps and frameworks the Android menu feature.
